name: Oh Weight!
description: Submission for 2020's GMTK Game Jam that I made with my girlfriend :D. The theme was "Out of Control". Your player randomly transforms every 10 seconds into one of three forms: a ball, a spring, and a weight; the ball behaves like a normal player. The spring launches in the direction of the mouse cursor; and the weight.. doesn't do much. The map will rotate around occasionally making getting to goal either really easy, or really hard.
